task_text: [Epidemiology][Comparative-Analysis] Compare outbreak-detection approaches between CDC Pandemic Flu protocols and WHO COVID-19 guidance.

gold_end_state.summary: CDC protocols emphasize established sentinel surveillance and laboratory confirmation for influenza with predefined thresholds, while WHO COVID-19 guidance emphasizes broad testing, case reporting, and genomic surveillance for novel pathogen detection; both systems use indicators to trigger public-health action but differ in scale and emphasis given pathogen novelty.

quiz.question: Which guidance emphasizes genomic surveillance for novel variants?
